title: Arrays Problem 1

title: DFS Problem 1
description: Given a graph or tree, perform depth-first search (recursively or iteratively) to compute the requested metric.

title: Graph Problem 1
description: Graph-theory problem: compute shortest paths, connectivity, or other graph metrics as described.
